metadata.synopsis: Repeated AD dialog for a guard stationed at the entrance of Jannath's Estate, welcoming guests. He ponders asking for a promotion, before complaining peacably to himself. The AD will only trigger if no player is close to him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter then leave trigger S_LOW_ComplainingDoormanTrigger at CTY_Main_A -259; 21; -71

0.speaker: Doorman Phubbs
0.text: I don't know how Mr Mnemonis does it, standing out there all day.
0.context: NodeContext: To self. Impressed at his boss's fortitude

1.speaker: Doorman Phubbs
1.text: Perhaps I should speak to Mr Mnemonis about a promotion...
1.context: NodeContext: To self, forming a plan

2.speaker: Doorman Phubbs
2.text: Can't wait for this shift to end. Feet are killing me.
2.context: NodeContext: Mild complaint, not particularly bothered. To self.

3.speaker: Doorman Phubbs
3.text: I've more to offer than standing guard all day. A chamberlain, maybe.
3.context: NodeContext: To self, forming a plan
